name: MagicCat
description:
On an unknown planet, more cats and fewer monsters live there. One day, the leader of the monsters has avenged the cats because of the previous contradictions. He used the power of a magic crystal to seal the guardian planet's Godly animals into the crystal balls and lock them into different places. Since then, the planet's ecological environment has begun to change badly, and the cat's disaster and crisis began to followed...
The cats who are born with magic will take on the journey of saving all Godly animals, their race, and their homes.
